query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW0304( MANDT, INP_DT, PSPID, POSID, GUBUN, PRONR, PROWRK, PRO_R, MDATE, MTIME, ERNAM, VER, COM_CHK, INS_GBN )
VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #INP_DT#, #PSPID#, #POSID#, #GUBUN#, #PRONR#, #PROWRK#, #PRO_R#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID#, #VER#, #COM_CHK#, 'S' )
